summary: Motivated logistics specialist with extensive experience in inventory control, mail room operations, and transportation logistics. Managed multimillion-dollar munitions inventories with 100% accuracy and led teams to provide reliable service for 5,000+ soldiers while maintaining compliance with military and federal regulations. Holds a current Secret Clearance.

experience.title: Non-Commissioned Officer in Charge, Brigade Mail Room
experience.description: Opened, developed, and managed a consolidated mail room for 5,000 soldiers. Certified by the USPS and handled over 300,000 pieces of mail, as well as 10,000 pieces of Certified and Registered mail with zero loss. Trained 6 soldiers to perform as a cohesive team while accomplishing daily activities of the brigade mail room.

experience.title: Ammunition Specialist (SPC/E-4, Promotable)
experience.company: 4th Combat Aviation Brigade (Ammunition) â€” Fort Carson
experience.description: Developed load plans based on training requirements and federal regulations regarding the transport of hazardous materials. Trained and guided several junior soldiers in the operation of material handling equipment and its use in safe handling and transportation of aviation ammunition.

experience.title: Ammunition Specialist (Promotable)
experience.description: Supported all basic training and advanced individual training, weapons ranges. Ensured all training was conducted as scheduled by consistently making all deliveries on time with 100% accuracy. Assisted in the drawing, delivery, and turn-in of over 14 million rounds of ammunition, valued at over $30 million.

experience.title: Ammunition Stock Control and Accounting Specialist
experience.description: Stock Control: Inventoried, issued, transported, and managed over $100 million of military munitions with zero loss. Instructed and trained 5 personnel on the Standard Army Ammunition System-Modular (SAAS-MOD). Communicated effectively with civilian contractors, and Republic of Korea officers and soldiers in a successful effort to ship 100 containers of ammunition back to the United States.

experience.title: Residential/Commercial Painter
experience.description: Maintained professional appearance and attitude, to develop client confidence. Consistently developed ideas to maximize output and accuracy. Accomplished tasks to standard, often ahead of time on both; jobs working alone and jobs working as a team member.
